name: The Backrooms Project (Very Early)
description:
Controls

Mouse - Look

WASD - Move

Shift - Sprint

This is a very early form of a Backrooms fan game I am currently developing.

On full release I plan on having a story mode, survival mode, multiple levels (mainly Levels 0, 1 and 2), hostile entities and (maybe) mobile controls.

The game will be short and I don't have a release date yet. Ideally, the game will be finished within the next two weeks. For now, enjoy what (little) there is so far!
